title: The Construction of Multifunctional Solid Electrolytes Interlayers for Stabilizing Li6PS5Cl-based All-Solid-State Lithium Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03289F, Paper
Ya Chen, Xin Gao, Zheng Zhen, Xiao Chen, Ling Huang, Deli Zhou, Tengfei Hu, Bozhen Ren, Runjing Xu, Jiayi Chen, Xiaodong Chen, Lifeng Cui, Guoxiu Wang
The electrochemical performance of all-solid-state Li metal batteries (ASSLMBs) can be prominently consolidated by resolving the challenges triggered by the uncontrolled growth of Li dendrites throughout the solid electrolytes (SEs)....
